DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine technique use vacuum erection device ( VED ) best . Erectile dysfunction ( ED ) robotic prostate cancer surgery concern surgeon patient . Recent study show begin use vacuum pump daily basis start 2-8 week may help prevent start penile shrinkage . This potential issue occur decrease blood flow prostate cancer surgery . This study allow researcher determine compare vacuum therapy technique erectile function outcome patient prostate cancer surgery
DOC.brief_title: Vacuum Erection Device Improving Recovery Erectile Function Patients With Prostate Cancer Undergoing Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Determine sexual function penile morphometric outcome post-robotic-assisted laparoscopic prostatectomy ( RALP ) patient undergo daily vacuum therapy use one two randomize method whether outcome differ . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Compare compliance rate two randomized group use compliance questionnaire diary collect patient follow visit . II . Compare overall patient satisfaction recovery procedure two randomized group utilize SHIM ( Sexual Health Inventory Men ) questionnaire . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment group . GROUP A : Patients receive vacuum therapy daily 10 minute hold erection 2 minute undergoing RALP . Patients complete erection process 5 time . GROUP B : Patients receive vacuum therapy daily 10 minute hold erection 5 minute undergoing RALP . Patients complete erection process 2 time . After completion study treatment , patient follow 3 , 6 , 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Sexually active men without consistent use erectile aid preoperatively ( i.e . oral pharmacotherapy , intraurethral prostoglandin E1 [ PGE1 ] , intracavernosal injection therapy penile implant ) Undergoing bilateral nerve spar robotic prostatectomy Preoperative baseline SHIM total score great equal 17 Presence female sexual partner Dexterity necessary operate vacuum pump Has history cardiac failure , angina , lifethreatening arrhythmia within past 6 month Has take prescribe nitrate medication form last 6 month Has know sensitivity Phosphodiesterase type 5 inhibitor Sildenafil , Tadalafil Vardenafil Men sickle cell anemia Men insufficient manual dexterity operate vacuum device Men history know penile deformity Peyronie 's disease Pre postoperative androgen therapy Pre postoperative radiation therapy pelvic area Men actively smoke time enrollment , 1 pack per day
